aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.firstDescription: I'm a full stack developer with a strong passion for design, technology, and everything with a retro soul. My portfolio reflects my love for 8-bit graphics and interactive experiences that spark
aboutMe.secondDescription: In my free time, I enjoy creating 2D games using Godot, blending code, pixel art and creativity. I'm always exploring new tools and learning something new, because I believe growing as a developer is a game that never ends.

proyects.title: Project
proyects.pokedex: A Pok√©mon-inspired card game built with React, Redux Toolkit, and Phaser. It features collectible mechanics, dynamic rendering, and MongoDB integration for storing user data and card collections.
proyects.restaurantProject: A full-stack restaurant template built with the MERN stack. Designed as a teaching tool to demonstrate backend integration, dynamic routes, and responsive layouts using real-world examples.
proyects.clickMarket: E-Commerce with the MERN stack featuring user registration and login, shopping cart, favorite products, CRUD operations for users and products, and a simulated purchase with Stripe.
proyects.mimArte: A custom-made website for a beauty salon, featuring responsive design, service listings, and booking options. Tailored to meet the visual identity and specific needs of the client.
proyects.vangaMovies: Responsive movie blog built with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. Showcases a simple yet elegant layout, grid-based sections for reviews, and adaptability across mobile and desktop devices.
proyects.soundStream: Music web app built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features user registration, login, CRUD functionality, song filtering, and an embedded audio player for playback.
proyects.chickenAdventure: 2D platformer built in Godot using pixel-art assets. Currently in development with multiple levels and increasing difficulty. Designed as a creative space to test game mechanics.
proyects.rollingGame: Small promotional game developed in Godot for RollingCode-related platforms. Created to be embedded on websites, combining marketing and interactivity in a lightweight format.
